Cat variant [[Tag (Java Edition)|tag]] was a group of [[cat variant|cat variants]].

=== default_spawns ===
Spawns on every day apart from the full moon. Replaced by [[Mob variant definitions#Spawn condition|spawn condition]].

Version added: [[Java Edition 22w13a|22w13a]]. Version removed: [[Java Edition 25w04a|25w04a]].

{{tag_list|default_spawns|type=cat_variant
|tabby
|black
|red
|siamese
|british_shorthair
|calico
|persian
|ragdoll
|white
|jellie
}}

=== full_moon_spawns ===
Spawns on the full moon. Replaced by [[Mob variant definitions#Spawn condition|spawn condition]].

Version added: [[Java Edition 22w13a|22w13a]]. Version removed: [[Java Edition 25w04a|25w04a]].

{{tag_list|full_moon_spawns|type=cat_variant
|#default_spawns
|all_black
}}
